message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. We believe this price reflects the high quality and value it brings to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value I place on it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a more reasonable offer. How about $135 for the product? This still allows us to maintain a fair profit while considering your budget.
